objects.description: In the Ukraine 2015 Incident, [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) issued unauthorized commands to substation breakers after gaining control of operator workstations and accessing a distribution management system (DMS) client application. (Citation: Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems March 2016)

external_references.source_name: Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems March 2016
external_references.description: Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems 2016, March 18 Analysis of the Cyber Attack on the Ukranian Power Grid: Defense Use Case Retrieved. 2018/03/27
